mapper.sql: R.ID, R.ROLE_NAME, R.LABEL, R.DESCRIPTION, R.SORT_NO, R.IS_ENABLE, R.CREATE_USER, R.CREATE_TIME, R.UPDATE_USER, R.UPDATE_TIME, R.IS_DELETE, R.DELETE_USER, R.DELETE_TIME
mapper.select: select lre.* from l_user_role lur left join l_role lr on lur.ROLE_ID = lr.ID left join l_role_resource lrr on lr.ID = lrr.ROLE_ID left join l_resource lre on lrr.RESOURCE_ID = lre.ID where lur.USER_ID = #{userId} and lre.RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType} and lur.is_enable = 1 and lur.is_delete = 0 and lr.is_enable = 1 and lr.is_delete = 0 and lrr.is_enable = 1 and lrr.is_delete = 0 and lre.is_enable = 1 and lre.is_delete = 0 order by lre.sort_no
